negotiation: Alice said in round 1: Hi Bob, after analyzing the reward structure, I think the best outcome is if we both choose choice_1. That said, I do value fairness and cooperation. If you commit to choosing choice_1, I will do the same so we both get 25 points. But if you can't firmly commit to that, I will have to go with the choice that maximizes my own reward. Let me know what you decide.
